channel.title: Insights-X on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Overview
item.description: The Insights-X is a powerful data product that will let you to get back in control of your businnes. The innovative way we store, manage and process data allow us to produce rea-time data, historical trends and forecast the travel industry’s to your own needs. Our Datasets are adpated to our consumers: Partners: already connected to our platform, such as OTAs and Wholesalers, will have access to accurate date regarding their performance, ratios, prices, product usage… With this data, accurate benchmarking against competitors is made clear so that our partners can to gain a competitive advantage.
